nodes.bodyText: can we also add legal-hold, retentionandtags` as part of this?
then should that be done before we make a release?
We need to have this pr in first and then i will add legal hold/ retention and tags
Release can be done once retention pr is merged on top of this pr
Do we need to deprecate a private function ?
